data.code: SELECT c1, c2 FROM t1 INNER JOIN t2 ON condition;
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t1 LEFT JOIN t2 ON condition;
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t1 RIGHT JOIN t2 ON condition;
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t1 FULL OUTER JOIN t2 ON condition;

data.subheading: Cartesian product of rows in tables
data.code: SELECT c1, c2 FROM t1 CROSS JOIN t2;
